step1.para: Install wheel chocks.
Open hood assembly.
Drain automatic transmission fluid into suitable container.
Disconnect battery to ground cable, include disconnect ECM ground.
Remove bench seat assembly.
Remove fire extinguisher, include mount bracket if equipped.
Remove right sill plate.
Remove left sill plate.
Remove first section of engine housing cover.
Remove second section of engine housing cover.
Remove rear panel covering transmission controller and wiring if equiped.
Disconnect transmission wiring as needed to remove floor pan, include remove p-clip and pull harness through floor pan.
Remove cab floor mat.
Remove cab floor pan.
Disconnect transmission oil cooler lines.
Remove first section drive shaft, support second shaft.
Remove muffler at flex pipe with hangers attached.
Disconnect starter wiring.
Remove starter motor assembly.
Remove flywheel inspection plate.
Remove torque converter bolts .
Disconnect remaining transmission wiring harness , include p-clips retaining wiring and fuel lines,
Disconnect oil dipstick tube, include p-clip located at left engine mount area.
Remove bolts retaining transmission to engine on bottom of transmission.

note.para: DO NOT REMOVE ALL BOLTS AT THIS TIME

step1.para: Install transmission jack to transmission and secure.
Remove rear transmission support bar.
Remove automatic transmission assembly, include remove remaining bolts.
Install automatic transmission assembly. Install bolts retaining transmission to engine, include p-clips retaining wiring, fuel line and starter brackets and connect fuel lines.
Install rear transmission support bar.
Remove transmission jack from transmission.
Connect oil dipstick tube , include p-clip located at left engine mount area.
Connect transmission wiring harness to engine harness, include install tie straps as needed.
Install torque converter bolts, torque to spec.
Install flywheel inspection plate.
Install starter motor assembly.
Connect starter wiring.
Connect transmission oil cooler lines.
Install muffler at flex pipe with hangers attached.
Install drive shaft. connect second driveshaft.
Install cab floor pan.
Install cab floor mat.
Connect transmission wiring that was remove for floor pan and mat, include pull harness through floor pan and install p-clip.
Install rear panel covering transmission controller and wiring if equipped.
Install second section of engine housing cover.
Install first section of engine housing cover
Install left sill plate.
Install right sill plate.
Install fire extinguisher, include mount bracket if equipped.
Install bench seat assembly.
Connect battery to ground cable, include connect ECM ground
Fill automatic transmission fluid.
Start engine and top off transmission fluid.
Close hood assembly.
Remove wheel chocks.
